question: 謀る
sourceAnswer:
<read>はかる</read>:<tag><ja>図る</ja></tag>:: to{} plan/attempt/devise | plot/conspire/scheme | aim-for/strive-for/work-towards/seek | deceive/trick/take-in
<read>たばかる</read>:: to{}{work-out-a-plan-of-deception/scheme/take-in/dupe/deceive} | to:{think-up-a-plan/think-over-a-plan} | to:{discuss/consult}
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>conspire</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to conspire</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to plot</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: A group of <reading>hacker</reading>s (<ja>はか</ja>) are getting together and trying to conspire and plot to take down the mainframe! Those hackers!
